name: I Ruff You
description:
I Ruff You is an adorable and hilarious dog dating sim. Explore a cute 'lil dog park and romance your way into the hearts of any of the four eligible bowchelors!

Read our features in The Odessey and Nerdist!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around the world and switch dialogue choices. Use the spacebar to interact with dogs and things in the world and choose a dialogue option.

Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for future updates.

Art by Kytana Le, programming by Lin Reid, and music by Lucien Ye.
